recommendations: Arun P. Iyer “Zach is a pioneer in the African Venture Capital space and both a thought leader and game changer on the continent. His focus on founders and working hand in hand with them to build their dreams and have impact on the continent truly sets him apart as an investor. He’s also one of the few people I have met with the critical thinking ability to rapidly analyze a business model quickly and effectively. Zach is an asset to any organization he backs as an investor and dramatically helps to create value for all shareholders. ”

Jim Chu “Zach works out of conviction and integrity. That, combined with unique knowledge of the African startup scene makes him and his friends well-positioned for success in the emergent rise of African tech. His new Launch Africa fund is at the right place at the right time for unprecedented growth in the next two decades. Watch him and this space. ”

volunteer_experience.info:
I was recruited to be part of an elite group of experts to judge Start-Up Chile’s applications. Start-Up Chile is an innovative program of the Chilean Government to attract world-class early stage entrepreneurs to start up operations in Chile for a few months in return for $40K of seed funding (no equity). For each round, I read and scored 10 entries to assess their team, project, market and impact on the Chilean entrepreneurial ecosystem. I am very proud of the incredible impact of this…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          I was recruited to be part of an elite group of experts to judge Start-Up Chile’s applications. Start-Up Chile is an innovative program of the Chilean Government to attract world-class early stage entrepreneurs to start up operations in Chile for a few months in return for $40K of seed funding (no equity). For each round, I read and scored 10 entries to assess their team, project, market and impact on the Chilean entrepreneurial ecosystem. I am very proud of the incredible impact of this program bringing over 1000 entrepreneurs to Chile in 2 years, while also inspiring both local startups and also other countries to copy and innovate on this important program.
